Yeah, 3 of my character names are from Final Fantasy 3. Rizopas and Atma, a=
nd the name Etchingar is a tweak on the name Intangir, another Final Fantas=
y 3 character. Love that game!...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: J=
onathan Hogan 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 18, 2000 3:=
01 PM
  Subject: Re: Starcraft and Neo Beast Wars/Machines


  lol true alo=
t of people use names from their other favourite games. Like mine, Xiane, i=
t's my account name and the name of one of my classes in Diablo2 :)
   
  X=

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: dcoburn 
    To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 18, 2000 3:54 AM
    Subject: Starcraft and=
 Neo Beast Wars/Machines


    Listen everyone, I have been noting that cha=
racter names are coming from the totally wicked PC/N64 game, Starcraft.  He=
re are the names that I found:
     
    Neo Beast Wars RPG:
              =
  -Zergling (Of the Zerg race, fast, cheap and effective in groups)
     
 =
   Neo Beast Machines RPG:
                -Raszagal (Leader of the Protoss=
 Dark Templar who were banished from the Protoss homeworld, Aiur)
         =
       -Archon (Of the Protoss race, two High Templars may merge into a psi=
onic entity known as an Archon.  Archons are really strong, and their movem=
ent isn't so bad)
     
    These 3 characters are all named after units in=
 Starcraft(Raszagal is not a playable unit).  I guess Starcraft is more pop=
ular than I thought.  Anyway, I'm not saying that these names are cheap, I'=
m just pointing out that they are from Starcraft/Starcraft: Brood War/Starc=
raft 64.  
     
    NOTE: The descriptions I put for these 3 guys are just=
 from Starcraft, you don't have to use them for NBWRPG or NBMRPG.

--------=
--------------------------------------------------------------------



---=
